text: Andy accidentally deleted the BroadwaySTAGE Fabric project, so I just recreated it and uploaded a new build, 0.6.2, with today's audio spectrum improvements. Also the onboarding screens are only shown on first launch, which should speed testing up a little.
i'm going to post this on the broadway slack as well so they're aware

hey <@U02F8TTPU> i just shared with you the "feedback" that Andy mentioned he would be passing along. It's almost all visual QA with the exception of some animation requests on the intro/onboarding screens
i'm talking with him now about priority and will follow up
let me know any red flags you see in there
Just reviewed quickly, all looks good. Looks like some other items may be on the way
Parallax animation is somewhat time-consuming (because each thing has to be individually choreographed) but totally doable
the other animations shouldn't be too time-consuming, I expect
totally - i called that out already with andy
we're going to hold off on it for now until all of those assets are final
